metadata.title: Home
metadata.description: iGEM TSUKUBA Editor is an editor created by iGEM TSUKUBA, a general student organization at the University of Tsukuba. It is used as an editor to compile materials for participating in iGEM. It is not available for use by anyone other than members.

email.subject: Email Verification
email.title: Email Verification
email.description:
Your email verification has been received. ðŸŽ‰
Thank you for using our service.
To access our services, you need to verify your email address.
email.instruction: Click the button below to complete your email verification. Please make sure to verify within 24 hours.
email.warning:
If you did not request this email, it may have been sent by mistake. Please ignore and delete this email.

The verification link is valid for 24 hours. If it expires, please request verification again.
email.support: For support, please contact us at <link>support@{domain}</link>.
